mapper.select:
select count(DISTINCT d.device_id) from t_device d join t_device_app da on da.device_id=d.device_id join t_app ap on ap.app_id=da.app_id where d.`status`=true and ap.`status`=true
and ap.channel_id=#{channelId}

select count(DISTINCT d.device_id) from t_device d join t_device_app da on da.device_id=d.device_id join t_app ap on ap.app_id=da.app_id where d.`status`=true and ap.`status`=true and !ISNULL(da.activate_time)
and ap.channel_id=#{channelId}

select bd.brand_id, bd.brand_name, md.model_id, md.model_name, DATE_FORMAT(dv.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') createTime, dv.device_id, dv.device_name, dv.source, dv.uuid, dv.serial_number, dv.wired_mac, dv.wireless_mac, dv.enable_status, dv.imei, dv.imei2, dv.bluetooth, dv.firmware_info, dv.remark from t_device dv left join t_brand bd on bd.brand_id=dv.brand_id left join t_model md on md.model_id=dv.model_id where 1=1 and dv.`status`=true and dv.device_id=#{deviceId}

select bd.brand_id, bd.brand_name, md.model_id, md.model_name, group_concat( CONCAT_WS('/',ap.app_name,DATE_FORMAT(da.activate_time,'%Y%m%d %H:%i:%s'),da.sn_code) separator ' | ' ) appInfos, DATE_FORMAT(dv.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') createTime, DATE_FORMAT(dv.update_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') update_time, dv.device_id, dv.device_name, dv.source, dv.uuid, dv.serial_number, dv.wired_mac, dv.wireless_mac, dv.enable_status, dv.imei, dv.imei2, dv.bluetooth, dv.firmware_info, dv.remark from t_device dv left join t_brand bd on bd.brand_id=dv.brand_id left join t_model md on md.model_id=dv.model_id left join t_device_app da on da.device_id=dv.device_id left join t_app ap on ap.app_id=da.app_id where 1=1 and dv.`status`=true
and ap.channel_id=#{channelId}
and dv.enable_status=${enableStatus}
and da.sn_code like CONCAT('%',#{snCode},'%')
and dv.serial_number like CONCAT('%',#{serialNumber},'%')
and dv.uuid like CONCAT('%',#{uuid},'%')
and dv.source=#{source}
and DATE_FORMAT(dv.create_time,'%Y%m%d')>=DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y%m%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(dv.create_time,'%Y%m%d')<=DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y%m%d')
and (dv.wired_mac like CONCAT('%',#{mac},'%') or dv.wireless_mac like CONCAT('%',#{mac},'%'))
and (dv.device_id like CONCAT('%',#{device},'%') or dv.device_name like CONCAT('%',#{device},'%'))
and (bd.brand_id like CONCAT('%',#{brand},'%') or bd.brand_name like CONCAT('%',#{brand},'%'))
and (md.model_id like CONCAT('%',#{model},'%') or md.model_name like CONCAT('%',#{model},'%'))
and (ap.app_id like CONCAT('%',#{app},'%') or ap.app_name like CONCAT('%',#{app},'%'))
and !ISNULL(da.activate_time) and ISNULL(da.activate_time)
GROUP BY dv.device_id order by dv.device_id desc
